description: Refine the plugin architecture to make it more extensible and easier to add new capabilities.

todos.description: Refactor `ai_self_ext_engine/core/plugin.py` to define an Abstract Base Class (ABC) for plugins, including abstract methods for lifecycle management (e.g., `initialize`, `shutdown`) and a standardized way for plugins to declare or expose their capabilities, thereby enhancing the overall extensibility of the plugin architecture.
